A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The humor REALLY didn't land for me. A lot of characters doing things and making decisions that are inconsistent with their persona\, or just don't make sense. The Leia \"force\" scene was terrible\, uncalled for\, and just a bad decision carrie fischer pased away and that would have been a great send-off but they messed it up. Luke's death was the most unsatisfying ending in film history and had no payoff. Finn's romance with the resistance chic seemed forced\, un-earned\, and fake.
